===Overview===
'''Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints''' also known as the '''Mormon Church''' is a [[American]] [[Christian]] group. The groups main headquarters is located in [[Salt Lake City]], [[Utah (State)|Utah]]. 
===Origin===

===19th Century===
During the later 19th century, the [[Ringo Kid (Earth-616)|Ringo Kid]] stopped Cullin and his gang from robbing a wagon train of Mormon settlers when Flip mistook the Mormon's claims of "gold" being literal, as opposed to an allegory.{{r|Ringo Kid Vol 1 4}}

===Modern Era=== 
[[Jacob Raven (Earth-616)|Jacob Raven]] was a devout Mormon who relied upon his faith to help guide him to [[Louise Kennedy (Earth-616)|Louise Kennedy]]'s true killer.{{r|Web of Spider-Man #124}}

[[Mallory Book (Earth-616)|Mallory Book]], an attorney who earned the title of Miss Utah while graduating at the top of her class from BYU and whose path continually crossed with [[She-Hulk]].{{Citation}} 

After the superhero [[Civil War (Event)|Civil War]] the church sponsored a superhero team known the  [[Called (Earth-616)|The Called]], who became the [[Utah (State)|Utah]] team of the [[50-State Initiative (Earth-616)|50-State Initiative]], made up of heroes of the Mormonfaith.{{r|Civil War #6}}The [[Skrull Kill Krew (Earth-616)|Skrull Kill Krew]] and their Initiative allies killed the [[Skrull]] in their team before leaving to another state, while the Called stayed in Utah to handle the injured.{{r|Avengers: The Initiative #17}}
